title: INC-20260116-PARTIAL-0007 — CLEAR sanctions + TRY breach → PARTIAL RELEASE
resolution_notes: Partial release of TRY 6,400,000 approved. Remaining TRY 2,100,000 scheduled for T+1.
content: Supplier payment TXN-000567 to Ankara Construction Materials AS for TRY 8,500,000 submitted at 09:30 UTC on 2026-01-16. Established beneficiary with 18-month relationship and regular payment pattern. Sanctions screening returned CLEAR with 0% match confidence. Liquidity gate assessment: starting balance TRY 48,500,000, projected balance after full payment TRY 40,000,000, minimum buffer threshold TRY 45,000,000. Buffer breach detected - full payment would create TRY 5,000,000 shortfall. However, payment is divisible per originator confirmation. Treasury Manager evaluated options per runbook_emergency_payment.md Section 6.1. Option B selected: partial release. Calculation: maximum releasable amount = 48,500,000 - 45,000,000 - (prior queued outflows 2,100,000) = TRY 6,400,000. Treasury Manager approved partial release at 10:15 UTC. Originator (Procurement) acknowledged split payment arrangement at 10:30 UTC - TRY 6,400,000 released immediately, TRY 2,100,000 scheduled for next business day when expected TRY inflows will restore buffer. First tranche released via local RTGS at 10:45 UTC before 11:30 cutoff. Second tranche scheduled for 2026-01-17 at 09:00 UTC. Split payment schedule documented and attached to audit bundle. Business relationship maintained, buffer policy preserved.
